question: How has the technology focus area of companies evolved over the last few years?

subtasks.task: Identify the companies and their technology focus areas recorded within the last three years.
Gather metrics on companies' technology investments and partnerships from relevant tables to analyze trends.
Analyze social media data to gauge public interaction and engagement with companies focusing on emerging technologies.
Summarize findings to demonstrate trends in technology focus areas over time, supported by quantitative data from contracts and technology adoption.
